item.title: King Charles strips brother Andrew of titles and his mansion
item.description: Andrew, the second son of the late Queen Elizabeth, has come under mounting pressure over his behavior and ties to Jeffrey Epstein.

item.title: Delta and United call on Congress to immediately end government shutdown, pay air traffic controllers
item.description: The airline industry is pushing Republicans and Democrats to reopen the government as air traffic controllers work without pay.

item.title: The biggest takeaways from the Trump-Xi meeting â€” what the truce covers and what is still unclear
item.description: President Donald Trump said the rare earths agreement is a one-year deal that will be "very routinely extended as time goes by."

item.title: Shipping sector skeptical Trump's latest trade truce with China will reverse import decline
item.description: U.S. tariffs on imports from China remain relatively high even after a new trade truce between President Donald Trump and Chinese President Xi Jinping...

item.title: Shutdown cost government contractors $12 billion so far, Chamber of Commerce report says
item.description: The Chamber of Commerce urged Congress to pass a short-term funding bill that would reopen the federal government, which shut down on Oct. 1.
